summary: Single-letter action keys were intentionally removed in task 56, redirected to <leader>me which cannot work because Space is used for toggle selection. Solution: restore buffer-local single-letter keymaps (d, a, r, R, f, m, c, /) in setup_email_list_keymaps() calling existing functions in ui/main.lua.

artifacts.summary: Research report with complete keymap analysis, function locations, conflict analysis, and copy-paste ready implementation code
